TagManagerExtended.MicrosoftClarityTagDescription: Find out what your users want with Clarity.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleAnalytics4TagDescription: Analytics tools and solutions for your business.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleAnalytics4EventTagDescription: Send an event to Google Analytics 4.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleAnalytics4EventNameDescription: The event name must be written in lower case and in english. Read more on Google with 'GA4 recommended events'.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleAnalytics4EventParametersDescripti: Add up to 25 parameters to your event.
TagManagerExtended.AxeptioTagDescription: Cookie widget and management of marketing consent. Support Google Consent Mode v2.
TagManagerExtended.AxeptioClientIdDescription: Find in Settings > Installation > Project Id.
TagManagerExtended.AxeptioCookiesVersionDescription: Find in Settings > Installation > Cookies version.
TagManagerExtended.ClickDataAttributeDataAttributeDescripti: Only add suffix, if data attribute is data-demo just set "demo"
TagManagerExtended.DataLayerSyncTagDescription: Synchronize the Google dataLayer with Matomo _mtm.
TagManagerExtended.DataLayerSyncDataLayerNameDescription: Name of the JavaScript array to synchronize. If you want to sync the Google Tag Manager data layer, just set the value "dataLayer".
TagManagerExtended.CookiebotTagDescription: Cookiebot CMP makes the use of cookies and online tracking of your website GDPR compliant.
TagManagerExtended.CookiebotTagIdDescription: Insert the domain group id provided in the "Your Script" section on Cookiebot website.
TagManagerExtended.CookieYesTagDescription: Cookie Consent Solution trusted by a million websites.
TagManagerExtended.CookieYesTagWebsiteKeyDescription: Get your website key from CookieYes.
TagManagerExtended.KlaviyoTagDescription: Move fast with pre-built ecommerce email automations and real-time audience segmentation.
TagManagerExtended.KlaviyoTagCompanyIdDescription: Get your company ID from Klaviyo.
TagManagerExtended.BrevoTagDescription: Create, send and follow your Newsletters for free via a simple & effective platform.
TagManagerExtended.BrevoTagClientKeyDescription: Get your Client Key from Brevo.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleAdsConversionTagDescription: Send an event to track conversions.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleAdsConversionTagTransactionIdDescr: Passing a dynamic transaction ID helps avoid double counting conversions.
TagManagerExtended.MatomoEcommerceTagDescription: Get ecommerce data from your website.
TagManagerExtended.MatomoEcommerceTrackingTypeDescription: Select between view_item, view_item_list, update_cart and purchase.
TagManagerExtended.MatomoEcommerceDataLayerVariableDescript: Create a {{Ecommerce}} data layer variable to collect the "ecommerce" key in _mtm.
TagManagerExtended.ListenLayerTagDescription: Cloud Data Layer Platform for Website Analytics.
TagManagerExtended.ListenLayerAccountIdDescription: Get your account Id from https://app.listenlayer.com/my-account
TagManagerExtended.AffilaeProgramIdDescription: Get your program Id from affilae.com.
TagManagerExtended.SlackTagDescription: Slack is a proprietary collaborative communications platform and project management software.
TagManagerExtended.SlackWebhookDescription: Incoming Webhooks are a way to post messages from apps into Slack. Documentation : https://api.slack.com/messaging/webhooks
TagManagerExtended.SlackMessageDescription: You can use Markdown syntax to format messages.
TagManagerExtended.OneTrustTagDescription: OneTrust's Trust Intelligence platform connects teams, data and processes so you can collaborate seamlessly.
TagManagerExtended.OneTrustTagDomainDescription: Enter your domain id to data-domain-script part of the script.
TagManagerExtended.SimpleAnalyticsTagDescription: Simple Analytics is a simple Google Analytics alternative. One dashboard to instantly see how many visitors are coming to your website.
TagManagerExtended.ConsoleTagTypeTitle: Select the console method you want to use
TagManagerExtended.ConsoleTagTypeDescription: Methods are used to format content in the console.
TagManagerExtended.ConsoleTagContentDescription: This could be plain text or variables, objects and arrays are allowed.
TagManagerExtended.AlertTagContentTitle: Content that would be displayed in the alert
TagManagerExtended.AlertTagContentDescription: Should be plain text or numbers.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleTagTagDescription: The Google tag provides the Google products you use with data to measure the effectiveness of your website and ads.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleTagTagIdDescription: A tag ID is an identifier that you put on your page to load a given Google tag.
TagManagerExtended.IntercomTagDescription: Expand your customer base and growth with the customer communications platform.
TagManagerExtended.IntercomTagApiBaseDescription: US : https://api-iam.intercom.io - EU : https://api-iam.eu.intercom.io - Australia : https://api-iam.au.intercom.io
TagManagerExtended.IntercomTagUserIdDescription: The variable you use to capture the user's ID
TagManagerExtended.IntercomTagUserNameDescription: The variable you use to capture the user's name
TagManagerExtended.IntercomTagUserEmailDescription: The variable you use to capture the user's email address
TagManagerExtended.IntercomTagUserCreatedAtDescription: The variable you use to capture the user's sign-up date
TagManagerExtended.IntercomTagAlignmentDescription: Customize left or right position of messenger
TagManagerExtended.MatomoSearchTagSearchCategoryDescription: Search category selected in your search engine. If you do not need this, set to false.
TagManagerExtended.MatomoSearchTagSearchTotalDescription: Number of results on the Search results page. Zero indicates a 'No Result Search Keyword'. Set to false if you don't know.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleConsentModeTagDescription: Consent mode v2 allows you to communicate to Google the consent status of your users regarding cookies or application IDs.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleConsentModeTagConsentActionDescrip: Select 'default' to set default values, and 'update' to handle users consent.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleConsentModeTagConsentTypesDescript: The consent state must be 'denied' before the user gives consent. Once consent is received, you can trigger this tag with the action mode set to 'update' and all consents state set to 'granted' for all consent types. (All consent types are available in the Google documentation). Consent state must be 'denied' or 'granted', no other values are allowed.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleUserProvidedDataTagDescription: It supplements your existing conversion tags by sending hashed first-party conversion data from your website in a privacy safe way.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleUserProvidedDataTagPhoneNumberDesc: User phone number. Must be in E.164 format, which means it must be 11 to 15 digits including a plus sign (+) prefix and country code with no dashes, parentheses, or spaces.
TagManagerExtended.GoogleUserProvidedDataTagAddressStreetDe: User street address. Example: '123 New Rd'
TagManagerExtended.GoogleUserProvidedDataTagAddressRegionDe: User province, state, or region. Example: `Hampshire’
TagManagerExtended.GoogleUserProvidedDataTagAddressCountryD: User country code. Example: 'UK'. Use 2-letter country codes, per the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 standard.
